com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.storage

Class StringPropertiesProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.storage.StringPropertiesProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Properties

    public class StringPropertiesProxy
extends Object
implements Properties
    The Class StringPropertiesProxy could be used to access another store where it is impossible to get all properties at once.
